sentences.en: Are you a gambling man, Mr Graham?
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆先生,你是好赌的人吗?

sentences.en: Even for gambling , he had prepared mahjong sets, so much more refined than common betting games.
sentences.cn: 连赌钱, 他都预备下麻将牌, 比押宝就透着文雅了许多.

sentences.en: Gambling was here in profusion, and dancing in plenty.
sentences.cn: 在这里大家跳舞跳得忙, 赌钱赌得凶.

sentences.en: He has a taste for gambling.
He lost all his money gambling and now he's really in Queer Street.
sentences.cn: 他把钱都输光了,现在可真狼狈了.

sentences.en: He needed money to feed his addiction to gambling.
sentences.cn: 他需要钱来满足他的赌瘾。

sentences.en: He went to a psychiatrist about his compulsive gambling.
sentences.cn: 他去看精神科医生治疗不能自拔的赌瘾.

sentences.en: I'm gambling that this package won't upset your life in any way.
sentences.cn: 我把宝押在这个包裹不会拢乱你的生活上.

sentences.en: Looked from the gambling angle that Shenhua this act is certainly undisputable.
sentences.cn: 从博弈的角度看,申花此举当然无可厚非.

sentences.en: Mom, Dad was killed by '' Crazy '', the guy who runs the gambling place.
sentences.cn: 妈妈, 其实爸爸是被那个赌档门口的 大 丧杀死的.

sentences.en: Romance is the big event of a lifetime , far more important than gambling.
sentences.cn: 人家终身大事, 比赌钱要紧得多呢.

sentences.en: The boss of the gambling house raked off 20 % for himself.
sentences.cn: 赌场老板提取20%作为抽头.

sentences.en: The lottery is probably the most popular form of gambling.
sentences.cn: 彩票可能是最普遍的一种赌博形式。

sentences.en: The men have been gambling away all night.
The police raided a number of illegal gambling dens (= places for illegal gambling ).
sentences.cn: 警方突击搜查了几个非法赌窟。

sentences.en: Their taste for gambling has endeared them to Las Vegas casino owners.
sentences.cn: 他们因好赌而深受拉斯维加斯赌场老板的欢迎。

sentences.en: Uncle George swore off gambling, drinking and womanizing.
sentences.cn: 乔治叔叔发誓戒赌 、 戒酒、戒女色.

words.tran_cn: 赌博；孤注一掷；投机；打赌
赌博；孤注一掷；冒险假设

trans.tran_en: when people risk money or possessions on the result of something which is not certain, such as a card game or a horse race

trans.tran_cn: 赌博，冒风险(gamble的现在分词)
